desc: Home of the official UNC Kenan-Flagler MBA Student Store. The best place to get all Kenan-Flagler branded apparel and accessories. All proceeds go to the MBA Student Association to fund student activities.

layout.text: The Kenan-Flagler Student Store is closed for the summer

The KF Store team will be back in the fall with new products.
In the meantime, follow us on Instagram for real-time updates!
